title: My Fiance is in Love with My Little Sister - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Fantasy   Josei   Mystery   Psychological   Romance   Tragedy
tags: Adapted to Manga   Adultery   Affair   Arranged Marriage   Character Growth   Child Abuse   Childhood Love   Complex Family Relationships   Death   Depictions of Cruelty   Depression   Engagement   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   First Love   Flashbacks   Hard-Working Protagonist   Hated Protagonist   Immortals   Inferiority Complex   Late Romance   Long Separations   Misunderstandings   Multiple POV   Nobles   Obsessive Love   R*pe   Time Loop   Tragic Past   Unlucky Protagonist   Unreliable Narrator   Unrequited Love   Younger Sisters
author: Hanabusa   はなぶさ
description:
Aah, again? 

My fiance was gazing intently at my charming younger sister. 

When I saw the blaze that lit up in those cold eyes, I was assaulted by deja vu.

My fiance had been in love with my younger sister even in the last life. 
There was nothing I could do but watch. 

And, by some karma, I was someone who kept returning to that exact moment.>
